import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faAngleLeft, faEnvelope, faMobile, faUserCircle } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { Col, Row, Form, Card, Button, FormCheck, Container, InputGroup } from '@themesberg/react-bootstrap'; import { Link ,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; import { Routes } from "../../routes"; import BgImage from "../../assets/img/illustrations/signin.svg"; import {useRegisterUserMutation} from '../../services/UserAuthApi' export default () => { const[server_error,setServerError] = useState() const navigate = useNavigate(); const [registerUser,{isLoading}] = useRegisterUserMutation() const handleSubmit = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const data = new FormData(e.currentTarget); const actualData = { owner_name : data.get('owner_name'), Brand_name : data.get('Brand_name'), physical_address : data.get('physical_address'), Phone : data.get('Phone'), email : data.get('email'), names : data.get('names'), username : data.get('username'), phone : data.get('phone'), Email : data.get('Email') } const res = await registerUser(actualData) if(res.error){ console.log(res.error.data.errors) }if(res.data){ console.log(res.data) } } return (

Back to homepage

Registration

User Details
Names Username Phone number Email I agree to the terms and conditions
or
Already registered? {` Login here `}
); };
